usage:
<script>
import svupa from 'svupa';
const svupa_client= svupa(supabase_client, 'table_name', 'primary_key');
let { store: rows } = svupa_client.request({'type': 'eq' ,'column': 'my_column', 'value': 'my_value'});
</script>

{#each $rows as row (row.key)}
    <RowComponent {row} on:click={() => {svupa_client.delete(row)}}>
{/each}
sql: INSERT INTO table_name (primary_key, my_column, another_column) VALUES ('key-123', my_value, 'new data');
